about_the_game:
Choices matter. Uncover different progression paths and outcomes based on your decisions.

Freedom to role-play. Become a loyal tool in the government's hands or a corrupt opportunist. Fight for equality or follow conspiracy theories. Be snarky, serious, smart, dumb, brave, or cowardly. Manipulate others or let them take advantage of you.

Be a pro or fail miserably. Find dirt on your suspected dissenters and build your interrogation strategy around their personalities and weaknesses. Or miss important clues and make a complete fool of yourself. One way or the other, the game will proceed.

A narrative Metroidvania. Explore intricate locations, meet bizarre characters, solve puzzles and find tools to unlock new areas.

Experience a retrofuturistic dystopia. Witness the launch of the first-ever space mission, discover otherworldly messages left by unknown entities and figure out the mystery of how your world came to be.

short_description: In this non-linear dystopian adventure, your goal is to hunt down dissidents standing in the way of a brighter future. Interrogate your fellow citizens, gain evidence of dissent, reveal their motives, and decide their fates. Support the system or use your position to dismantle it, brick by brick.
